title: Episode 267: Mike Edison – "You Are A Complete Disappointment"
description: This week on Eat Your Words, Cathy is joined in the studio by fellow HRN host Mike Edison, who just kicked off the tour for his new tragic-comic memoir, You Are a Complete Disappointment: A Triumphant Memoir of Failed Expectations. Tune in for this tale about being the person who you want to be, not the person you're told you should be.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
